String.string: Finding the Flame
"I understand."

Go to Commander {@linkcreature:528#5005#Tamur} at Kaiator Command Center and report that you have destroyed the Cyasma Spire at {@Rgn:49001$$Argonea}. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
"I understand."
Speak with Adeldur at Kaiator Command Center. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
"Let's go."
Tell Adeldur that you're off to investigate the researchers.
"Right. Okay."
"I understand."
Go to Shroud Outpost at Granarkus and confirm the Agnurok Engine research results from Virienne.
Near the Argon Energy Purifier
You found the energy Virienne is tracking.
Go to the {@linkobject:120#energy purifier} southeast of Noyul Extractor in Granarkus, then open a teleportal for the researchers.
Eliminate the zomgul gatherers around the energy purifier so the researchers are safe.
Insert a relic stone into the energy purifier so the researchers can come through a temporary teleportal.
"I understand."
Speak to Virienne, who came through the portal.
"I understand."
Follow Dadoam, who left to follow the energy conduits.
Destroy the incubator the researcher Dadoam spoke about before he can spawn argons.
Origin of the Howls
You see Kelsaik!
You heard a howl near the Incubator. Go to the source of the howl and look for Kelsaik.
Destroy the Crossing the Streams near Kelsaik.
"I understand."
Talk to Dadoam about Kelsaik and Shandra Manaya.
